title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: May 25, 2022, 10:36:37 PMLast edit: May 27, 2022, 08:59:47 PM by ZipReg
content: Greeting Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! While I haven't been very active lately due to IRL stuff, I wanted to do something special for pizza day, so here is a better late than never (4) WINNER PIZZAFFLE2022!! A chance for all to snag a sealedpizza day box set and/or runner up prizes, multiple wins per spot are possible! [PIZZAFFLE2022!!] 1st PRIZE: (1) Ledger Nano S Limited Edition #1 PIZZA DAY Box Set!One of only 1337 Made! Brand new, factory sealed2nd PRIZE: (1) CoolStorage™ Bitcoin 2020 Arcade BUILT prototype!This is the first built prototype I've offered3rd PRIZE: (1) Crypto Imperator BTC carbon fiber keychain (matte version)4th PRIZE: (1) Vizique 10,000 BTCitcoin Laszlo's pizza day note(right click on image to open larger in new tab)Tickets:1 - YodasRedRocket2 - Suzuki Matt3 - sunnybwoy4 - Otillio13305 - Cryptogreatdane6 - Cryptogreatdane7 - MrCryptHodl8 - sunnybwoy9 - The_Crypto_Kid0 - YodasRedRocketa - PreciousMetapsICTb - MoparMiningLLCc - PreciousMetapsICTd - Dernostee - DirtyBirdEf - CryptogreatdaneGeneral Info: Price Per Ticket: 0.0007BTC Pay after half full.Ticket Limit: (1) PER Member / first 12 Hrs. No limit thereafter, take them all if you'd like. Shipping: Mostly Worldwide Included. Any Import/VAT taxes paid by winner.Payment: 3BDLhfGypvg4etnT63rRTBfCWx6PWeW8Q7How To Play:Pick one or more of the available Tickets slots from the table above. PM or post a reply with your pick(s) + the txID of your transaction. Once all Tickets are taken (and paid for) we'll select a future BTC block number. The last 4 characters in the hash of that block will decide the 4 winners!Last char = 1st prize then 2nd, 3rd, and 4th prizes per character after, respectively. Thank You & Good Luck!
